#summary Positioning options

= Positioning options =

*Top location*
 controlStage.TOP

*Bottom location*
 controlStage.BOTTOM

*Left location*
 controlStage.LEFT

*Right location*
 controlStage.RIGHT

*Centered location*
 controlStage.CENTER

== Combinations ==

You can combine options, for example:

 controlStage.TOP + controlStage.RIGHT
